channel.title: Need help translating
channel.description:
This piece of text is in an old language, but I thought that it may contain words that look like Finnish, Swedish or Norwegian. If you can just skim through this and look for words that look familiar, I'd be very gratefull. Here is the text:
Okke min sun Hissa boka mot i mih lif and sels waria. Se umbifattah hiu skednisse fon us els folk ak fon usa ehlum. Urleden jer hab ik ham vter flod ared tolik mih hi and hinra moder. Ha hia weron wet wrden. Herhruch guaon hia afternei urdarua. Umbs hia nautto urlfsa hab ik ra up wrlandisk pampler uur- skreven. sahwsrsa hu se erve. Mot hu se ak wrskrlua. Hin barn alsa til hiv hia nimmsrhs wei naut ne kuma. skreuuen to livwert. Nei atland sunken is. hat hria- rvsond fiuwer lundred and niugon and fiuwertigosnier. hat is nei kersten reknoa hat tuelf hundred sex and fifti gosts jer. hidde tobinomah oera linda. whk.
If you can post translations in this format that would be easier for me to work with. (not nessecary): Original word: Translated word into english: Language: Example: Original word: Urleden Translated word into english: Past Language: Frisian Thanks alot!

item.title: Need help translating
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“lordbost, post:9, topic:136622”][quote author=bowserjr2 link=topic=188153.msg1700793#msg1700793 date=1188062156]
It is not Swedish Danish or Norwegian.

But there is some Norwegian word, but that will not be at help.
[/quote]

Strange, i cant see a single Norwegian word[/quote]
Da får du se betre etter.

Boka, mot, i, folk, flod, Ha, skreven, se, barn, Nei, is, and and min is in norwegian.

But so Un-Named say the is some Dutch in the text.

The have some with Love to do the tittle two last word is Love Sun.

Read full topic

item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Hmm, yea that says something like: "has twelve hundred fifty six gosts(dunno what that is) years.

item.title: Need help translating
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

I thought it was Dutch. :\

Just a guess, but:

hat tuelf hundred sex and fifti
gosts jer.

Looks a lot like “has twelve hundred ?? and fifty ?? ??”

Read full topic

item.title: Need help translating
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

You can talk to ghosts if you say it all out loud!

No it’s just from an old book I found on the internet. It’s full of cool story’s It already has been translated (altough not this page and another one) but I just want to learn a bit about this language.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help translating
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

This piece of text is in an old language, but I thought that it may contain words that look like Finnish, Swedish or Norwegian. If you can just skim
through this and look for words that look familiar, I’d be very gratefull. Here is the text:

Okke min sun

Hissa boka mot i mih lif and
sels waria. Se umbifattah hiu
skednisse fon us els folk ak fon
usa ehlum. Urleden jer hab ik
ham vter flod ared tolik mih
hi and hinra moder. Ha hia
weron wet wrden. Herhruch
guaon hia afternei urdarua.
Umbs hia nautto urlfsa hab ik
ra up wrlandisk pampler uur-
skreven. sahwsrsa hu se erve.
Mot hu se ak wrskrlua. Hin
barn alsa til hiv hia nimmsrhs
wei naut ne kuma.
skreuuen to livwert. Nei
atland sunken is. hat hria-
rvsond fiuwer lundred and niugon and fiuwertigosnier.
hat is nei kersten reknoa
hat tuelf hundred sex and fifti
gosts jer. hidde tobinomah
oera linda. whk.

If you can post translations in this format that would be easier for me to work with. (not nessecary):

Original word:
Translated word into english:
Language:

Example:

Original word: Urleden
Translated word into english: Past
Language: Frisian

Thanks alot!

Read full topic
